scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross at the center. To the left, the Virgin Mary kneels in sorrow, attended by other women, one of whom holds a vessel. To the right, a group of men, some in armor and one wearing a crown, observe the scene. In the background, a city skyline with towers and domes is visible. The ground beneath the cross is littered with bones and a skull, symbolizing Golgotha, the place of the skull.
